column2: "Hey peon. Heeeey, peeeeon."
"...Ahhh, shut up already! What, do you need something?"
"Peon, have we met somewhere before? You don't feel like a stranger somehow?"
"It feels like our photons are similar. It's mysterious, and interesting. Hey peon, why?"
"...How could I possibly know something you don't?"
"Also, I'm not 'Peon'. My name's Sara."
"I see, so you're Sara. I'll remember that. Anyways, peon!"
"I said my name is Sara!"
"I'm not stupid! I remember perfectly. You're Sara, and Sara's a peon!"
"You're calling me a peon on purpose, aren't you?"
"It's not on purpose! Peon is a peon!"
"What's this? Aren't ya sisters close?"
"...We're not sisters. How do you even make that mistake?"
"Really? Ya two are similar height, and your faces even look similar. Dontcha think so too?"
"Getting along great, huh? That's nice, that's nice. Let's get along, have fun, and get going."
"...You know, we came for an investigation."
"It's an investigation to uncover the past. There's no way I can enjoy this."
"...If you say so. Even if it's an investigation or whatever, it's just gonna be full of bad things."
"Instead of feeling down like that, we should just have some fun."
"...Are you not particularly bothered by your own origins?"
"You seem like a native of the planet, but why can you understand us without a translator, and stuff?"
"Nnnn... I am interested, but not like knowing that's gonna help me for what I need."
"We have a proverb that goes like this. \"Don't be afraid of looking back, be afraid of looking forward\"."
"Well, that's the mentality I have when fleeing from enemies."
"This is a world of survival of the fittest. No time for redoing. Gotta keep looking forward, or else."
